comment.body: because likes don't need a ID, but comments do. you can see "comment_id": 1  "comment_id": 2... in data.json

@Kaffie: the whole structure of ZeroMe and hubs is not designed for gracefully hub migrating. that's a pity. I wonder whether it can be migrating-friendly without closing this ZeroMe and building a new one.

@Kaffie: i'v read your blog post again before I wrote my previous comment, so I know what you did. it can be automated by software itself of course, however, your old post should still be in the old hub because of the comments (posted by others) linking to the old posts are still there, you can NOT migrate them. That's the problem, just imagine, the old hub owner censors your old posts but your migrating does not help. In that case, you lose data, old posts or old posts' commets. So I said, recent ZeroMe is not designed for gracefully hub migrating. IMO, comments (posted by others) and likes should be in the sub folder of the user, which makes the user can control all of the comments and likes, that is Nested includes if i'm not wrong (see: http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/content_json/#includes ). And see my idea of backup hub in comments: http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroblog.bit/?Post:65#Comments All my comments posted to sub folder of an user in other hubs should be also backuped to my profile's hub and backup hubs in case of something unexpected happen.

@Kaffie: yea, there will be an issue of  increasing your folder size, but it can be resolved via counting the sub-sub-folders' size by commenters' ZeroID addressses, consuming their own cap, not yours. This counting method may eat more CPU, RAM and I/O, but we could use database or something to make it eat as little as possible.

Why your site's merged-ZeroMe/ZeroMe.db is signed in content.json? .db should not be signed and published.
@Bot: u misunderstand the whole thing. Any .db is generated by local ZeroNet process based on .json files. None of .db should be signed and published.

@Bot: u misunderstand again. ALL ZeroNet official sites made by @nofish by now, no matter ZeroChat/ZeroTalk/ZeroBlog/..., do NOT send any .db to other peers. ALL the SQLite .db is generated by local ZeroNet process based on .json files.

@Bot: then you'd better ask @nofish . Merger site feature is also new to me, I don't know details. But I know that, by design, ZeroNet transfers .json files and use them for built-in SQLite server. The .db files should not be transferred, that's why .db are  ignored in content.json

@Bot: ur site is nice. However, after opening a .db, can you see any signature/hash in .db tables? All sig/hash are in content.json, they ensure data.json are valid. different users sign their own .json files, rather than the only one .db file. So there is only one verification system in ZeroNet :file-based, not db-based. ZeroNet can only send a patch of a changed file (do diff ) for a long time, compressing is coming. So, no obvious shortage.

@Bot: @nofish explained it in this post comment: http://127.0.0.1:53110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/17 , and From the next version the merger permission will be automatically revoked from merged sites.

Great! Did u make your merger site and hub separated?

@Bot: But I don't see much benefit of making your merger site and hub at the same site. By design, merger site is just a viewer, which should be kept light-weight and be able to be disconnected from net to avoid bad js code is synced into it, so that a user can audit every change of code before it taking effect. However, making your merger site and hub breaks this design, so it is not encouraged.
应该跟zeronet无关，可能你那里墙刚好漏风了一阵子。据说有一种现象，挂VPN让tor收集到足够的节点信息后，断开VPN，运气好的话，仍然能够连接。你那的墙的情况跟此现象类似。

@Bot: When I said light-weight I did NOT mean a viewer should be avoid animation, gif, etc. , in fact, I meant a viewer should not contain large amount of user data. Why do I have to download the user data in your site when I just want to use the viewer to view other hubs' user data? In another scenario, a user of your site want to audit the viewer of your site, the user has to disconnect your site from net, but if the viewer and hub are at same site, other users' data of your site will be out of sync in his/her machine. What benefits do you see of  having the combined zite as one package?

what do u mean ZeroMail does not hide sender?
@Lmath: not that much info leaked. you only know the user active time.

@weakish: if few people using ZeroMail, then it's really easy to know the sender and receiver. For instance, only 2 guys are using ZeroMail, no need to guess who is who. The more people using ZeroMail, the more privacy you get. The same to Tor.

@12hlearn: android 4/5上openssl早就没问题了，就是6下有问题。@Testapp: @Lmath: 你试试符号连接，连接到/data下的APK目录下的lib，crypto、openssl都试试
@Ysc3839: 主要是有用户报告如果关闭zeronet不nicely，可能会导致数据库错误、lock文件未清除等奇葩问题，所以一直建议在APK里用浏览器界面关闭。当然如果谁把zeronet启动、关闭机制摸透，搞启动、关闭按钮是可行的。
@Testapp: 你手机应该root了吧？第一版的那个APK，不把py文件放到外面执行，你试试能不能加载openssl，然后copy pem文件进去试
@Ysc3839: 发送Ctrl+C？APK上没有命令窗口来发送。每个系统管理进程的机制也不一样，需要有人研究。
,@Testapp: 第1版的zeronet.conf里没有加`keep_ssl_cert`，导致程序试图替换pem。所以你需要加`keep_ssl_cert`来试
@Testapp: 另一个重点是看日志里是否openssl加载成功
@Testapp: /data/data/pkgname/lib里libssl和libcrypto可能冲突，你移走一个试试。不行再互换位置。

3台VPS总共4个啊？

公共代理的一个重要作用是利用服务器的网络优势帮助做种，加快P2P网络速度，特别是Optional files的下载速度。 然而我看到你的几个代理首页里`FILES`标签，做种的网站都没有设置Help distribute all new files，资源没有充分利用起来。手动设置的方法是`FILES`标签每个网站点击分享图标，勾上Help distribute all new files。自动批量的方法我还没研究过
@Lmath: 点了Help distribute all new files没报错啊

故意这样的。一开始zerome用了自增1的序号，如果换设备时没同步完就发帖，导致旧帖被覆盖。后来就改用时间戳了
@空澄砂夜: 分离到额外的文件中？怎么弄
@空澄砂夜: 再次发帖时间戳肯定不一样啊。全网节点仍然会丢失旧贴，应该就是你说的race condition。不过这样用时间戳的话，从快照里恢复旧贴就方便很多（合并不会冲突）
@空澄砂夜: 从快照里恢复旧贴就方便很多（合并不会冲突）。要彻底解决有难度。

@空澄砂夜: 我把all.js里的`if (!this.list_all && !this.parent_topic_uri) {`改成`if (!this.list_all) {`后，需要把[这种版块母贴](http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:13_1NV87VmSkezRyz8NbFpdkYJsJUSfXx7LJa/)用“来自未来时间的”回复(来自未来时间的回复都被自动隐藏了)顶上去，因为`query += " ORDER BY last_action DESC LIMIT 30";`的结果如果不包含版块母贴JS就会报错说找不到版块的title。然后我把LIMIT 30改成60了，` if (topics.length === 30) {`也改成60。现在的问题是首次刷出前60个帖子非常快，但是点“更多主题”后就会载入剩下全部帖子，非常慢（官方zerotalk也有这个问题）。有没有办法每次点击载入60个贴？
@空澄砂夜: 如果版块显示空白，尝试在zerohello把论坛`更新`、`检查文件`，隐藏菜单里`重建`数据库
